trait.name: Brave
text: Narbeck has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Greataxe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: For 1 minute, Narbeck can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand Narbeck. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Narbeck is incapacitated.

reaction.name: Parry
text: Narbeck adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Narbeck must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
